template.subject: Activate your OpenGrooves account!
template.html:
A while ago, you signed up for an OpenGrooves account...

The Baltimore-based music project is now ready to invite a couple early-adopters to get a little more familiar with OpenGrooves and, hopefully with your help, provide some feedback in order to improve the site for our users.

Click here to activate your account

OR, if the link above does not display, copy and paste the following URL into your web browser:
[[ACTIVATION]]

So what's next? You may notice that it is a little quiet once you're on the site. You're one of a handful of people chosen to be part of the OpenGrooves pre-launch. We hope that you stick around and check back once in a while. The project can only grow with YOUR support.
